response.original_title: NJPW G1 Climax XXI ~ The Invincible Fighter ~ - Tag 1
response.overview: August 1st, 2011 :: New Japan Pro Wrestling presents the first night of the 21st G1 Climax. Night one took place at the Fukuoka International Center in Fukuoka, Japan with a reported attendance of 4,500. Matches include:  • G1 Climax 2011 Block A Match Yuji Nagata vs. Hiroshi Tanahashi  • G1 Climax 2011 Block B Match Satoshi Kojima vs. Minoru Suzuki (w/Taichi)  • G1 Climax 2011 Block B Match Shinsuke Nakamura vs. MVP  • G1 Climax 2011 Block A Match Lance Archer vs. Togi Makabe  • G1 Climax 2011 Block A Match Yujiro Takahashi vs. Tetsuya Naito  • G1 Climax 2011 Block B Match Wataru Inoue vs. La Sombra  • IWGP Junior Heavyweight Title Match Kota Ibushi (c) vs. Ryusuke Taguchi  • G1 Climax 2011 Block A Match Giant Bernard vs. Hideo Saito  • G1 Climax 2011 Block A Match Yoshihiro Takayama vs. Toru Yano  • G1 Climax 2011 Block B Match Hiroyoshi Tenzan vs. Hirooki Goto.
response.title: NJPW G1 Climax XXI ~ The Invincible Fighter ~ - Tag 1
